articles.title: Jeep likely to drive in petrol options for its entire Indian portfolio - Business Standard
articles.description: Jeep India: India is the only country outside North America where Jeep makes four models locally, and also exports to other right-hand-drive markets around the world

articles.title: Vivek Ramaswamy Wants To End H-1B Visa Programme, He Used It 29 Times - NDTV
articles.description: Calling the H-1B visa programme "indentured servitude", Indian-American Republican presidential aspirant Vivek Ramaswamy has vowed to "gut" the lottery-based system and replace it with meritocratic admission if he wins the race to the White House.
articles.content:
Vivek Ramaswamy is himself the child of immigrants.
